title: Coconut Estate for sale at Kalpitiya.
details:
This land situated at Kalpitiya (Puttalam Dis) located to Thalaiyadi Village, presently we can find out for small tourist hotel next to this land; this land got two side electricity facilities and pure freshwater facilities with one servant cottage.
Here 300 big coconut trees ,160 young coconut trees (Ready to Harvest) and 240 small coconut trees (6 years old) ,25 Small mango trees (High Breed) presently 5500-6000 coconuts income for every 45 days , expecting for 11000 coconuts every harvesting.
• Meters distance to lake side and lake view cabana.
• 1.5 km distance to Kalpitiya – Palavi Main road
• Land situated next to (NACHIYAMMAN MAALIGAWA) historical place.
• 10 minutes driving distance to lagoon and beach (KITE SURFING / DOLPHINE WATCHING )
• Mostly suitable for (AGRO TOURISM).
• Clear title deed
